content.description:
Fun climbing up chert rails.

 Met Josh on my way up to bolt one day.  He was interested in climbing so I invited him out for this FA.  Not sure if he ever climbed again.

 This route was bolted solely for the purpose of allowing for the first ascent, and the first ascent information is posted here solely to document the history of the first ascent. No person should read this posting with the assumption that this route or the fixed gear left behind is safe in any way or otherwise appropriate to allow for safe subsequent ascents. Climbing is dangerous and should only be done with the appropriate training and risk management practices that include providing for the climber's own safety. Attempting to climb this route as described above or by any other means or methods could result in injury or death.
content.location: Rightmost route on the bottom tier.

content.description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Chertles, On the scene, cool teens, doing Ninja things.
content.protection: 6 bolts to mussys.  Shared anchor with Chertcuterie.

content.description:
This is a chossy cliff. It is the nature of the rock here, and it does add danger to the area. The use of helmets and caution are highly recommend while climbing here. Be weary from rockfall off the upper tier as well as when pulling rope.

 All climbs have anchors with hooks of some kind to make cleaning easier.

 All climbs on the bottom tier can be climbed with a 60m rope.

 Climb at your own risk.
